EmailTemplate.description: GTO Solution Updated To Audit Status
EmailTemplate.name: GTO Solution Updated To Audit Status
EmailTemplate.subject: Solution# {!Solution.SolutionNumber} - Solution updated to Audit Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Solution.Approver_Name__c},
Solution #{!Solution.SolutionNumber} has entered into the Audit phase of the Knowledge Management process. You are the identified Approver for this Solution. Please review and timely disposition this Solution according to the criteria within AG-5218. This Solution can remain in Audit status for up to 45 days, allowing time to fit the review process into your work schedule. Should the Audit date expire before the disposition the status of this Solution will automatically revert to "Technical Review".
Search Results of a Solution Full Text Search will return a Solution in Audit status, but not a Solution in Technical Review status.
Click the below link to view details: {!Solution.Link}
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
